description:
Project Goal: Deliver scalable cheap dietary advice at population level.
Research Question: How can we automatically derive dietary advice from loyalty card data at population level?
Methods: Collection of grocery shopping data from loyalty card data. Creation of a model to predict professional dietary advice from this data. Deliver this advice to users.
Expected Outcomes: System that can deliver scalable cheap dietary advice at population level in countries that have high (grocery shopping) loyalty card rates.
name: FoodCoach
